Computer Laboratory

    Cambridge Cybercrime Centre Internet scanner

    This scanner is run by the Cambridge Cybercrime Centre. We are investigating the consistency of hop counts across prefixes.

    We are using the exclusion list maintained by DNS-OARC and so if you do not want to be scanned please get yourself added to that list. You may also email us directly.
